//Generated by BehavEd

set ( "SET_SEARCH_OFF", "ON" );
set ( "SET_RELEASE_ONCONTACT", "ON" );
set ( "SET_ANIM_SEQUENCER", "OFF" );

loop ( -1 )
{

	task ( "talk1" )
	{
		set ( "SET_ANIM", "Body|Script|Full+None+Normal+Stand|Subtle talking loop" );
	}

	dowait ( "talk1" );

	task ( "talk2" )
	{
		set ( "SET_ANIM", "Body|Script|Full+None+Normal+Stand|Subtletalk2 - arms only" );
	}

	dowait ( "talk2" );
}
